description: This file implements the AdvancedConfig class, which provides wrappers for plugin registration, parameter get/set, attribute management, object creation/deletion, health checks, session management, and bulk parameter operations for an advanced configuration component in a software project. It includes external C functions for interacting with underlying system components and uses JSON objects for communication.

classes.name: AdvancedConfig
classes.description: Encapsulates methods to manage advanced configuration parameters, attributes, lifecycle, health, session, and bulk updates within the system.

methods.name: bool initialize(IN const char * szVersion)
methods.description: Initializes the AdvancedConfig object, used for registering the component with the agent.

methods.name: std::string testmodulepre_requisites()
methods.description: Sets up pre-requisites necessary for the component, such as registering the wrapper.

methods.name: bool testmodulepost_requisites()
methods.description: Resets or cleans up pre-requisites set during initialization.

methods.name: void AdvancedConfig_Start(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Attaches the component to the CCSP registrar, effectively starting it.

methods.name: void AdvancedConfig_Get(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Retrieves the value of a specified parameter.

methods.name: void AdvancedConfig_Set(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Sets a specified parameter to a given value.

methods.name: void AdvancedConfig_Set_Get(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Performs a set followed by a get operation to validate parameter setting.

methods.name: void AdvancedConfig_GetAttr(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Retrieves attributes for a specified parameter path.

methods.name: void AdvancedConfig_SetAttr(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Sets attributes for a specified parameter.

methods.name: void AdvancedConfig_GetNames(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Retrieves parameter names under a specified path.

methods.name: void AdvancedConfig_AddObject(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Adds a new object (row) in a table parameter.

methods.name: void AdvancedConfig_DelObject(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Deletes an object (row) from a table parameter.

methods.name: void AdvancedConfig_SetCommit(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Commits changes made to a table parameter.

methods.name: void AdvancedConfig_GetHealth(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Checks and reports the health status of a component.

methods.name: void AdvancedConfig_SetSessionId(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Sets the session ID for the current session.

methods.name: void AdvancedConfig_Stop(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Stops or deregisters the component.

methods.name: void AdvancedConfig_SetMultiple(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Sets multiple parameters in a single operation.

methods.name: AdvancedConfig * CreateObject(TcpSocketServer & ptrtcpServer)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: void DestroyObject(AdvancedConfig * stubobj)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: bool cleanup(IN const char * szVersion)
methods.description: unavailable
